A music notation engraving library

A music notation engraving library

Designed for the Music Encoding Initiative  ∙  Fast  ∙  Light  ∙  Flexible  ∙  No dependencies

Features SMuFL Command-line tool JavaScript toolkit Python toolkit Structure
Shared Tempi and directives Coloring Common Music Notation Score and barlines Score changes Chords Grace notes Beam breaks Cross-staff notation Ties and slurs Dynamics and hairpins Tuplets Tremolos Octave shift Piano pedals Repeats and endings Mensural notation Mensural notation Critical apparatus Apps and readings Editorial markup Editorial and choice markup Harmony Indications of harmony Vocal text Lyrics

Features

This section shows some of the features of Verovio. All the examples are rendered dynamically in the web-browser with its JavaScript toolkit version.

The order of the provided example features is related to the corresponding modules of the MEI guidelines.
